oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resignation letter to C.S.A. Secretary of War from Capt. Lipscomb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter of resignation from Capt. John Calvin Lipscomb sent to the C.S.A. Secretary of War, James A. Seddon. Remainder of collection will be microfilmed (additional materials). Letter was written from camp, 27th Tennessee Infantry Regiment. Reverse portion of document filled with signatures and dates.
